After checking out their website and services  (and seeing their support for the community), I will go out of my way to buy from this shop!

What labor unions are participating? If we don't have them, this is not going to be a *General Strike*. [NATIONAL SHUTDOWN—FRI. JANUARY 30](https://nationalshutdown.org/home#endorsers)

Here's a list of organizations that have endorsed the strike. I don't know if it's a complete list, but you can take a look Those aren't labor unions unfortunately. Speaking as a 25 year union member, if a general strike happens it will be without them.

The statements coming from the ones I've seen boil down to if someone is contracted to work on the 30th and they fail to report to work, they could be subjected to legal action for breach of contract. If you aren't working tomorrow then protest away.

It is what it is. Did u even bother to read the list? A student union is not the same as a labor union, and all the others are non-profits.
Make me holey in San Jose Oooh i have been thinking of getting a new piercing

Are teachers/schools participating? I haven’t been able to tell. I ask because I usually sub in Fridays but if you’re not working I’m not working. I think some schools' students are planning walk outs. I'm not sure about teachers, though, and im not sure how many schools are actually participating
